website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, fast-acting anti-wrinkle serum that hydrates and tones to reduce the look of fine lines.
pros: Moisturizes without leaving your skin greasy
Improves the appearance of wrinkles quickly
cons: Not the best choice if you have oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Vichy serum is worth every penny. You can use it alone or with your moisturizer. It’s really improve the texture of my skin over the last few months. The first post menopausal product I found that works .
customer_reviews.author: JeanneKailua

customer_reviews.title: It is Magic!
customer_reviews.text: Best face oil around for my own skin situation. I believe this oil helped clear up my rosacea. It is so sheer that it soaks into your skin in seconds and smells wonderful! Thank you for providing a great product and it was wrapped with care. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: The best facial oil I have tried! I will but again. Note: I have VERY dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my aging skin. Feels fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of this elixir oil face serum. I purchased the first. It’s often hard to admit as you age that your skin needs different things. This is the right serum for my right now skin. It has a light floral fragrance that I like. It is an oil and leaves my face soft. If feels wonderful on the skin, like a spa day. My skin looks better, healthier and is better moisturizer and hydrated. This is perfect for me although in my 30s I would have found it excessively oily. I think it is really intended for dry or aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: Quickbeam

customer_reviews.title: Not My Favorite Vichy Product (4- Stars)
customer_reviews.text: This oil works well to moisturize and protect my face, but I'm not wild about its application and the initial oily feel. You put a few drops of oil on your fingertips, and gently rub into your skin. Yes, it absorbs fairly quickly. But yes, it's a thin oil that can drip between your fingers before it makes it to your face. I've discovered that it's better to do one drop at a time to cover a single area before moving on. I love the effects of this oil serum. I just don't like the medium. -- Debbie Lee Wesselmann
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lee Wesselmann

customer_reviews.title: Oily
customer_reviews.text: This "Elixir Face Oil" is, well, oily. I am not new to facial oils, but I find that this one by Vichy is not easily absorbed. It stays on the skin. Even when i apply the oil at night, I can see the remnants of it the next morning. If you have very dry, parched skin on your face, perhaps this is a good product for you. Otherwise, it's probably not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Wandrwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few days and I really like it! The design is great with a little pump doppler type thing to dispense. It isn’t greasy at all and just sinks into my skin without sitting on top. I love the smell so much. I wouldn’t say I have sensitive skin but maybe temperamental where some products will affect me and I’ll get a rash or some kind of reaction to it where this I haven’t at all. Very impressed with this product. I will have to do an update later to see if it is still deserving of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hydration
customer_reviews.text: I actually think this may be a bit pricey for a serum without retinol. I totally found it moisturizing especially around my eyes, very hydrating. Very little is needed so this will probably last a long time though I have been more liberal with it on my neck and décolletage and I really like the results. It’s not ...greasy but it’s is oily so attempting to apply makeup over it was a chore. I really had to let it dry, best for evening use.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight oil to use alone or as part of bedtime routine
customer_reviews.text: I have used this alone and along with my regular serums and moisturizer and it works great. I usually use this at night as a last step. This is a lighter texture than the Clarins face oil I use during the winter, which makes it perfect for warm summer weather when my face tends to be oilier anyway. It's also great to dab a little on sun and wind burned faces just don't go out in the sun without sunscreen afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: knitting ninja

customer_reviews.title: When you age beyond 78 there is not too much you can change.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has tried this for awhile and then decided her wrinkles are there because she is over 78 years of age. She said that her skin accepts this oil nicely, it smells good, but that in reality there is not too much improvement for her. One thing that she did consider is that if you start using this before getting too wrinkled that might be the answer to it being more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Easily Absorbed Serum - For Beautiful Soft Skin
customer_reviews.text: Vichy Neovadiol Elixir is a face serum in my favorite form, an oil. It is drawn up into an eye dropper and applied to my face and neck twice daily. My face is so soft. Serums are easily absorbed into my skin and are so easy to apply. Just draw up serum into the eye dropper, apply into the palm of my hand, and rub on my clean face and neck. Great softness, splendid moisturizer. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela V

customer_reviews.title: Favorite serum so far, and I've tried several!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this soaks into the skin "just enough". I've tried others (e.g., Elemis, L'Occitane, Obagi, etc.), but so far this is my favorite (and most affordable, ironically). The smell is fresh but not overpowering and it doesn't sit on top of the skin as much as the others. It feels like it really gets deeper into the skin and I really like that. So far I have tried several Vichy products and I've loved them all - even the price! ~Amy
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works well, it is oil based
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a month now. I do like the way my 60-something skin feels softer and it does appear plumper. I am eliminating a star as I do find it oily (well, it is oil based) and I do need to wait a good 10 minutes before applying makeup (to assure it is absorbed). I usually really like Vichy products and although this does work, not sure if I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Softer skin, overnight!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used an oil on my skin until I was tempted to try Vichy. Being out on a farm, my skin tends to be less than smooth - and my usual moisturizer wasn’t working anymore. I tried Vichy - and I’m amazed. The soft, clear skin is back. I wash my face and apply it every night - and enjoy softer skin in the morning. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McArthur

customer_reviews.title: So Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders on dry skin. You only need a drop or two. It's velvet soft and not greasy at all. You can use it night or day, but using it at night is especially nice. The soft scent is calming and your skin feels amazing when you wake up! So happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: OutlawPoet

customer_reviews.title: Wow----this oil is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great for my older, drying face. This is so ultra soothing to my face. It is so precious to me that I won't dispense more than 2 drops or so onto my face before going to bed. Reading up on this product has educated me on how great this is for my skin. You can feel the difference between this oil and others you may have used. There is a difference.
customer_reviews.author: FiFi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I really liked Vichy Neovadiol Magistral Elixir Oil Face Serum, 1.01 Fl Oz. It worked really well. Works well enough. Fragrance is a little strong. I'm happy with this. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Im noticing a VERY slight difference. I don't like the applicator, and the instructions are on the inside of the box! I'm not very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Chandi Crook

customer_reviews.title: Non greasy feel
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying how hydrating and non greasy this oil left my face. I usually hesitate adding an oil to my routine as I have oily/combination skin, but this oil was very light weight and nice! No overpowering smell and loved the easy to use dropper!
customer_reviews.author: Monet Sathre

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my sensitive skin soft, supple and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I use this at night on clean skin. It feels wonderful going on, smells great, and absorbs well. My sensitive skin feels great in the morning. I took off one star because of the price. This is definitely a luxury item.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum. It absorbs into my skin quickly and easily, almost like it's drinking the elixir. Helps make my appearance more youthful -- in the morning, friends would say it looks like I look well rested and bright eyed. Will continue using this as long as they make it.
customer_reviews.author: LawyerMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it on my hands and elbows. The skin on my face isn't dry, but I can see that this would help dry skin on any area. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Verita

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Great hydrating oil. I first tested on the backs of my hands and it did a great job hydrating them and absorbing quick and completely. No greasiness or sticky residue. Nice light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Facial Oil
customer_reviews.text: It leaves your skin feeling soft and healthy, The fragrance is light and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Silverman

product_meta.title: Vichy Neovadiol Magistral Elixir Oil Face Serum, 1.01 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
"

Amazon is an authorized retailer of Vichy products.

Vichy Neovadiol Magisterial Elixir Face Oil Serum with Sheaf Butter is Vichy’s 1st facial oil that helps replenish skin with the lipids lost with age and leaves skin glowing and visibly re-plumped. Face oil is rich in omega oil, this precious oil leaves skin feeling smoother, more supple and radiant for an overall younger-looking appearance. Face oil may be used alone as a serum, with face moisturizer or as a face mask.

This face oil Face oil contains: Sheaf butter: Known for its hydrating, emollient and soothing properties. Rice bran oil: Used for its emollient, protective and anti-drying properties. Safflower oil: Used for its emollient properties. Vichy Mineralizing Water: A miracle of nature from the preserved region of Auvergne, rich in 15 minerals, helps strengthen the skin's moisture barrier function to help protect skin against aggressors.

This facial oil is:

 * Paraben-free.
 * Tested under dermatological control for safety.
 * Allergy-tested.
 * Suitable for sensitive skin.

Ingredients: Acrylic/Caprice Triglyceride /Dicaprylyl Carbonate /Butyrospermum Parka Butter / Sheaf Butter /Orzo Sativa Bran Oil / Rice Bran Oil /Carthamus Tinctures Oil / Safflower Seed Oil /But /Tocopherol /Capsicum Annul Extract / Capsicum Annul Fruit Extract;Parfum / Fragrance.

Product packaging may vary.

"

BRAND STORY
Founded in France in 1931, Vichy’s formulas combine clinically-proven ingredients with mineral-rich volcanic water to deliver real results to women of all ages. Today, Vichy is the #1 Anti-Aging Brand in European pharmacies.
